thread.title: Donna Hofstetter
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Donna Hofstetter

author: Donna Hofstetter
title: Donna Hofstetter
text: I wanted to frame a large show car sign. My intent was to protect the edges as well as complete the look. My salesperson was helpful in recommending the most cost effective way to complete my project. Just today, I put it together and it looks handsome. The frame was the finishing touch. First time I have seen a metal frame around an acrylic hand painted show car sign board. My sign painter will be impressed! I am a stickler for details and this frame gave me that!
